comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swang: Thanks for the identification of Cornell coach Charles E. Courtney. Another image of him is here from the Cornell Daily Sun, 27 May 1911: (scroll down on left to see image, on right for link to larger image) cdsun-test.library.cornell.edu/cgi-bin/newscornell?a=d&am... We will add the information to the source data and reload the description.
